snippet: The 37-year-old woman and mother of 11-year-old twins was attacked by an unknown assailant in the bathroom of a shopping mall.
lead_paragraph: The 37-year-old woman and mother of 11-year-old twins was attacked by an unknown assailant in the bathroom of a shopping mall.

headline.main: American Woman Dies in Stabbing in Abu Dhabi
headline.print_headline: American Woman Dies in Stabbing in Abu Dhabi
